mutants.code:
import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    string = re.sub('[^A-Za-z0-9]+', '', string.lower())
    return string != string[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    string = re.sub('', '', string.lower())
    return string == string[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    string = re.sub('[^A-Za-z0-9]+', 'MUTATED', string.lower())
    return string == string[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    string = re.sub('[^A-Za-z0-9]+', '', string.lower())
    return string == string[::+1]

import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    string = re.sub('[^A-Za-z0-9]+', '', string.lower())
    return string == string[::-2]

import re

def is_palindrome(string):

    return string == string[::-0]

import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    string = re.sub('[^A-Za-z0-9]+', '', string.lower())
    return string == string[::-0]

import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    string = re.sub('[^A-Za-z0-9]+', '', string.lower())
    return string == string[::--1]
